snippet: George Hill hit two free throws with 2.2 seconds left in overtime, helping Indiana after squandering a 19-point lead over the Orlando Magic in the fourth quarter.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Indiana Pacers defeat Orlando Magic, 101-99, in overtime, to lead first round playoff series, 3-1.
lead_paragraph: George Hill hit two free throws with 2.2 seconds left in overtime, helping Indiana after squandering a 19-point lead over the Orlando Magic in the fourth quarter.

headline.seo: Pacers Beat Magic in Overtime and Lead Series 3-1
headline.main: Pacers Win in Overtime for 3-1 Lead
